Text.Page: You have delivered sarberry ices to the festival pilgrims.
<PCNAME>, I'm so glad you're here! Do you have time to help me? <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What do you need?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I've made all these sarberry ices for the festival pilgrims, but Luman is too busy to deliver them!

Just tell my assistant, Trilyn, that you'll deliver them. "I suppose I have time."

Ah, . Lilan convinced you to help again, I see.

Oh, well, as long as you don't mind. I have orders here for Morun...Tanith...and Hayden. Take this one first; it's been waiting the longest.
So this is the famous sarberry ice? Why, it tastes just like summer!
Ah, sarberry ice. The perfect cold treat for a hot day, wouldn't you say?
Ah, sarberry ice! These are the real reason I come here, to be honest, but, uh, let's just keep that between us.
Thank you for helping me again, <PCNAME>! You're the absolute best!
